TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SoapOperationBinding extends System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension

summary.span: Representa una extensión agregada a un objeto incluido en un servicio Web XML.

span.span: Represents an extension added to an within an XML Web service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Esta clase especifica que la transmisión del mensaje utilizará SOAP y proporciona detalles sobre cómo se dará formato al mensaje SOAP.This class specifies that the message transmission will use SOAP and provides details about how the SOAP message will be formatted. Para obtener más información acerca de cómo especificar protocolos de servicios Web XML, vea [ [ \]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01dfc27c-c68e-4910-a0aa-5e4c2a766b0c).For more information about specifying protocols for XML Web services, see [[\]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01dfc27c-c68e-4910-a0aa-5e4c2a766b0c). Para obtener más información acerca de lenguaje de descripción de servicios Web (WSDL), vea la especificación en http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.For more information about Web Services Description Language (WSDL), see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/. ## Examples [!code-cpp[SoapOperationBinding#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapOperationBinding/CPP/soapoperationbinding.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[SoapOperationBinding#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapOperationBinding/CS/soapoperationbinding.cs#2)] [!code-vb[SoapOperationBinding#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapOperationBinding/VB/soapoperationbinding.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks Esta propiedad es necesaria para el enlace de protocolo HTTP de SOAP.This property is required for HTTP protocol binding of SOAP. El valor predeterminado es una cadena vacía ("").The default value is an empty string (""). ## Examples [!code-cpp[SoapBinding_SoapOperationBinding#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapBinding_SoapOperationBinding/CPP/soapprotocol.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[SoapBinding_SoapOperationBinding#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapBinding_SoapOperationBinding/CS/soapprotocol.cs#6)] [!code-vb[SoapBinding_SoapOperationBinding#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapBinding_SoapOperationBinding/VB/soapprotocol.vb#6)]
